Text: RE Update WaterDeskpst Please respond to Thank you Louise I will follow up with Greg ASAP Karen Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday February PM To Subject Re Update WaterDesk File picpcx Thank you for your email I would think you should talk to Greg Piper as soon as possible Greg apart from running the Origination Group of Enron Net Works is also its COO Greg does currently have a lot of opportunities in his group which may suit your skill set Regards Louise Embedded Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp image moved to file From Karen Welsch picpcx PM Please respond to To cc Subject Update WaterDesk Louise First congratulations on your resent position change Sounds like an exciting and challenging opportunity for you Second you may have already heard but I just wanted to touch base with you and give you an update on WaterDesk American Water Works on Friday notified us that they have decided to pass on the acquisition of WaterDesk This is unfortunate for both the industry and WaterDesk as a whole We are immediately positioning WD to sell the individual assets as feasible and have severed the team effective Thank you for providing the names of your Directors within Networks the team has been in contact with the various names you provided us Alex and myself will be remaining to work with various systems integrators and any other potential purchasers interested in the parts of WaterDesk during the next several weeks And finally on a personal note I was incredibly impressed with you and the way you carried yourself during our meeting last month It was refreshing to speak to someone as high energetic as you and to talk to someone who really gets it at Enron Id be interested if you had any opportunities andor suggestions for an individual such as myself given my background in developing and executing new business strategies for clients in the consulting arena and most recently leading the WaterDesk from a product to a services focused company I look forward to any suggestions you may have Regards Karen Welsch
